attributes.action: amend the the current 'double taxation' practice of  applying VAT on fuel AFTER duty has been applied to BEFORE duty is applied.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current practice of applying VAT after fuel duty has been applied is simply a tax on tax. Motorists generate some £23billion per year through fuel taxation and it is only fair that tax is paid on fuel and not on another tax.
